books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality, narrated by the young Scout Finch in the 1930s.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story about the young and mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby and his obsession with the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: The narrative of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to avenge the whale that bit off his leg.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that charts the emotional development of the protagonist, Elizabeth Bennet.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A story about a young man's experiences in New York City after being expelled from prep school.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: An epic high fantasy novel that follows the quest to destroy the One Ring.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy novel about the adventures of a hobbit named Bilbo Baggins.

books.title: Fahrenheit 451
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.description: A novel about a future society where books are banned and 'firemen' burn any that are found.

books.title: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: A dystopian novel that explores the dangers of a technologically advanced society.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A novel about a shepherd's journey to find his personal legend and fulfill his dreams.

books.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.description: A story about a young man who remains eternally youthful while his portrait ages.

books.title: The Diary of a Young Girl
books.author: Anne Frank
books.description: The diary of a Jewish girl hiding from the Nazis during World War II.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: A historical novel that tells the story of Russian society during the Napoleonic Era.

books.title: The Grapes of Wrath
books.author: John Steinbeck
books.description: A novel about the struggles of an American family during the Great Depression.

books.title: Jane Eyre
books.author: Charlotte BrontÃ«
books.description: The story of a young orphaned girl who overcomes hardships to find love and independence.

books.title: The Road
books.author: Cormac McCarthy
books.description: A post-apocalyptic novel that follows a father and son's journey through a devastated landscape.

books.title: Catch-22
books.author: Joseph Heller
books.description: A satirical novel set during World War II that follows Captain John Yossarian as he tries to maintain his sanity amidst the madness of war.

books.title: The Fault in Our Stars
books.author: John Green
books.description: A love story between two teenagers who meet at a cancer support group.

books.title: The Handmaid's Tale
books.author: Margaret Atwood
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society that treats women as property.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: A comic science fiction series that follows the misadventures of Arthur Dent after the Earth is destroyed.

books.title: The Kite Runner
books.author: Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A story of friendship and redemption set against the backdrop of a changing Afghanistan.

books.title: The Book Thief
books.author: Markus Zusak
books.description: A young girl living in Nazi Germany finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others.

books.title: Gone Girl
books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.description: A thriller about a man suspected of causing his wife's disappearance.

books.title: Little Fires Everywhere
books.author: Celeste Ng
books.description: A gripping novel about the intertwined lives of two families in suburban Ohio.

books.title: The Night Circus
books.author: Erin Morgenstern
books.description: A magical competition between two young illusionists takes place within an enchanting circus.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after being accused of murdering her husband.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama, chronicling her life from childhood to the White House.
